channel.title: Stackable/TwoHanded
channel.description:
I have found a bug in my server and I'm wondering how to fix it, as there is a stackable.dat file and a twohanded.dat file. But whenever I open them I don't see any writing/numbers; I see a lot of squares. Is there a way to open a .dat file other than seeing a lot of squares, or is there a way you can change it in the java/class files?
I'll be willing to REP+ the person that helps.

item.title: Stackable/TwoHanded

@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Erm, not quite sure.

Read full topic
